description:
https://review.openstack.org/#/c/110101/ introduced the requirement oslo.config>=1.4.0.0a3, however, this package doesn't exist on pypi:

https://pypi.python.org/simple/oslo.config/
http://pypi.openstack.org/openstack/oslo.config/
title: Could not find a version that satisfies the requirement oslo.config>=1.4.0.0a3

comments.content:
https://review.openstack.org/#/c/110101/ introduced the requirement oslo.config>=1.4.0.0a3, however, this package doesn't exist on pypi:

https://pypi.python.org/simple/oslo.config/
http://pypi.openstack.org/openstack/oslo.config/
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~joshua.hesketh

comments.content: This bug is causing turbo-hipster to fail as it can't install the deps.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~joshua.hesketh

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/110503
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
This is only true when using pip < 1.11 where there is no wheel support. Thus it may not be an actual bug depending on what pip version we should support.

Upgrading pip fixes the problem.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~joshua.hesketh

comments.content:
Change abandoned by Joshua Hesketh (<email address hidden>) on branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/110503
Reason: This is only true when using pip < 1.11 where there is no wheel support. Thus it may not be an actual bug depending on what pip version we should support.

Upgrading pip fixes the problem.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: I don't think this problem is what you think it is. After discussion on IRC, it sounds like you need newer virtualenv to install a recent enough pip that it knows about wheels by default.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~fungi
